topic.title: HPE Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade 2.0 Post-Alpha Release Build 22: Deploying the Baremetal Region

body.p: If you are installing the sacramento template, which includes the KVM region, the baremetal region, ESX storage, and uses HPE DCN VRS networking, follow these instructions. If you are installing a different deployment, disregard these instructions.

ol.li: Log into the HLM VM

Copy the ironic-standalone template from the /root/kenobi-node-configuration/dev-samples/ironic-standalone to the /opt/share/hlm/1/topologies/ directory.
If you execute the hnewcloud -l command, ironic-standalone is listed as a templates.

Execute the following command to create a cloud on the baremetal controller:hnewCloud <cloudname> ironic-standalone
Where: <cloudname> is an identifying name for the cloud and ironic-standalone is the deployment template.
Edit the /root/<cloudname>/vars/ldap.json file to disable LDAP."ldap_enabled": 0
Edit the /root/<cloudname>/vars/ironic.json file to configure VLAN ranges. Specify enough ranges so that the provisioning network can be on a separate VLAN than the tenant VLAN ranges.
Copy the /root/cg-hlm/dev-tools/ilopxebootonce.py file to the /root/<cloudname> directory.
Edit the environment.json file to specify the networks for the CLM (management), CAN, BM-CLM (baremetal management) networks as exposed to the HLM VM.
Configure the node-provision.json to include 3 controllers in CCN control plane and 1 baremetal controller (BAR) in the baremetal plane.
Execute the following command to ensure that all the controllers are configured to boot from PXE.python ilopxebootonce.py node-provision.json

Provision controllers with base hLinux OS through cobbler:hprovision <cloudname>
Where <cloudname> is the name of the baremetal cloud.While hprovision is executing, you can follow the status by launching the Cobbler UI at http://<PXE STATIC IP>/cobbler_web.

section.title: Generate Baremetal Cloud Definition
section.p: Execute the following from cloud base directory:hcfgproc -d definition.json <cloudname>
Where <cloudname> is the name of the baremetal cloud.

body.p: Use the following tasks to deploy the baremetal cloud.

ol.li: Execute from cloud base directory:hnetinit <cloudname>Where <cloudname> is the name of the baremetal cloud.

Verify that all controllers are pingable usinghnetping <cloudname>
Where <cloudname> is the name of the baremetal cloud.

p.b: Deploy Services and Bring up the Cloud

body.p: Execute the following command to from cloud base directory:
Where <cloudname> is the name of the baremetal cloud.

ol.li: Log into the HLM VM.
Execute the following command to login to baremetal controller through HLM VM: ssh cghelion@<baremetal controller ip>

On the baremetal controller node:
Execute the following commands to create a bridge called br-eth1 sudo ovs-vsctl add-br br-eth1 sudo ovs-vsctl add-port br-eth1 eth1 # assuming eth1 is the interface where BM-CLM is connected. ifconfig eth1 up ifconfig br-eth1 up
Execute the following command to restart the Open vSwitch agent (ovs-agent) on the Controller.sudo service neutron-plugin-openvswitch-agent restart
Update ml2 conf with vlan ranges and specify the BM-CLM vlan in the bridge: [ml2_type_vlan]network_vlan_ranges = physnet1:3405:3413
Adjust 3405:3413 vlan range to your environment
Edit /etc/neutron/neutron.conf and update credential secret:[ironic] credential_secret = 1d0b38f0632af45c9a125aeb38c98418

Execute the following commands:service neutron-l3-agent restart service neutron-dhcp-agent restart service neutron-metadata-agent restart service neutron-server restart service neutron-plugin-openvswitch-agent restart

Verify whether stackrcv3 and stackrc role are as follows:stackrcv3 role
export OS_USERNAME=admin export OS_PASSWORD=9YL8BgNAVZ7 export OS_TENANT_NAME=admin export OS_PROJECT_NAME=admin export OS_PROJECT_DOMAIN_NAME=Default export OS_USER_DOMAIN_ID=default export OS_IDENTITY_API_VERSION=3 export OS_AUTH_VERSION=3 export OS_REGION_NAME=baremetal export OS_AUTH_URL=http://BASE-CCP-T2-VIP-KEY-API-NETCLM:35357/v3 export OS_CACERT=/etc/stunnel/ssl/hlm/certs/ca.crt export OS_ENDPOINT_URL=adminURL
stackrc role -
export OS_PASSWORD=9YL8BgNAVZ7 export OS_USERNAME=admin export OS_TENANT_NAME=admin export OS_AUTH_URL=http://BASE-CCP-T2-VIP-KEY-API-NETCLM:35357/v2.0 export OS_CACERT=/etc/stunnel/ssl/hlm/certs/ca.crt export OS_REGION_NAME=baremetal unset OS_PROJECT_DOMAIN_NAME unset OS_PROJECT_NAME unset OS_USER_DOMAIN_ID unset OS_IDENTITY_API_VERSION unset OS_AUTH_VERSION
Execute the following command to source the stackrcv3 file:source stackrc

Execute the following commands to provision the networks and baremetal nodes.
Create baremetal provisioning network:neutron net-create provisioning-network --provider:segmentation_id <bm-clm-vlan-id> --provider:network_type vlan --provider:physical_network physnet1
Create tenant vlan network:neutron net-create tenant-network
Edit the /etc/ironic/ironic-conductor.conf file and specify the following in the DEFAULT namespace:provisioning_network_uuid = <prov-network-id>network_provider= neutron_plugin
Execute the following command to create dataase schema tables for Ironicironic-dbsync --config-file /etc/ironic/ironic-conductor.conf
Execute the following commands to restart Ironic services.service ironic-conductor restart service ironic-api restart

Create entry for switch connected to the baremetal nodes:neutron switch-create --host <switch_ip> --username <user> --password <password> --type s5930 --id <mac_address_of_switch> neutron subnet-create --name prov-subnet --gateway 192.168.61.1 --allocation-pool start=192.168.61.100,end=192.168.61.200 provisioning-network 192.168.61.0/24 neutron subnet-create --name tenant-subnet --gateway 192.68.61.1 --allocation-pool start=192.68.61.100,end=192.68.61.200 tenant-network 192.68.61.0/24
Upload User Image glance image-create --name ubuntu-14.04.02-amd64-disk --is-public True --disk-format qcow2 --container-format bare < ubuntu.qcow2

To perform nova boot, you need to have the deploy images first uploaded in glance: #Upload Deploy Images glance image-create --name deploy-initrd --is-public True --disk-format ari --container-format ari < ironic-deploy.initramfs glance image-create --name deploy-kernel --is-public True --disk-format aki --container-format aki < ironic-deploy.vmlinuz
The tarball containing above images can be downloaded from http://15.213.237.200/ironic-agent-2.1.0001.tgz

View details about the server:nova show 1b9f1f2b-4bcb-4363-bcf4-49d6a550460a
The output should appear similar to the following:+--------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------------+ | Property | Value | +--------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------------+ | OS-EXT-AZ:availability_zone | nova | | OS-EXT-SRV-ATTR:host | BMCLOUD-RCP02-T1-M1-NETCLM | | OS-EXT-SRV-ATTR:hypervisor_hostname | 5564213e-1e39-465b-be2e-5933c43650a0 | | OS-EXT-SRV-ATTR:instance_name | instance-00000013 | | OS-EXT-STS:power_state | 1 | | OS-EXT-STS:task_state | - | | OS-EXT-STS:vm_state | active | | OS-SRV-USG:launched_at | 2015-10-16T15:40:21.000000 | | OS-SRV-USG:terminated_at | - | | accessIPv4 | | | accessIPv6 | | | config_drive | | | created | 2015-10-16T15:34:21Z | | flavor | baremetal (6) | | hostId | dde2258e0d29285416349bfb26c71c23915a510b24681675f32005c1 | | id | 1b9f1f2b-4bcb-4363-bcf4-49d6a550460a | | image | ubuntu-14.04.02-amd64-disk (4b6b5bbe-39c8-4398-b2e6-1854496ef28f) | | key_name | - | | metadata | {} | | name | test1 | | os-extended-volumes:volumes_attached | [] | | progress | 0 | | security_groups | default | | status | ACTIVE | | tenant-network network | 192.68.9.54 | | tenant_id | c288a2816237465c8ea6efc16dc05b88 | | updated | 2015-10-16T15:40:21Z | | user_id | 2c34ae0b4cbd47a193a597bf5248c2db | +--------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------------+

View details about the network neutron net-show tenant-network
The output should appear similar to the following:+---------------------------+--------------------------------------+ | Field | Value | +---------------------------+--------------------------------------+ | admin_state_up | True | | id | 2c4f260c-507a-47a7-a0f4-7faebfe312b0 | | mtu | 0 | | name | tenant-network | | provider:network_type | vlan | | provider:physical_network | physnet1 | | provider:segmentation_id | 102 | | router:external | False | | shared | True | | status | ACTIVE | | subnets | 6a952e6b-903f-41db-b31d-62dc52c65dd0 | | tenant_id | c288a2816237465c8ea6efc16dc05b88 | +---------------------------+--------------------------------------+

View detailed information about a node:ironic --insecure node-show 5564213e-1e39-465b-be2e-5933c43650a0
The output should appear similar to the following:+------------------------+--------------------------------------------------------------------------+ | Property | Value | +------------------------+--------------------------------------------------------------------------+ | target_power_state | None | | extra | {} | | last_error | None | | updated_at | 2015-10-19T05:19:14+00:00 | | maintenance_reason | None | | provision_state | active | | uuid | 5564213e-1e39-465b-be2e-5933c43650a0 | | console_enabled | False | | target_provision_state | None | | maintenance | False | | inspection_started_at | None | | inspection_finished_at | None | | power_state | power on | | driver | pxe_ipmitool | | reservation | None | | properties | {u'memory_mb': 8192, u'local_gb': 40, u'cpus': 8, u'capabilities': | | | u'boot_mode:bios,boot_option:local'} | | instance_uuid | 1b9f1f2b-4bcb-4363-bcf4-49d6a550460a | | name | None | | driver_info | {u'ipmi_terminal_port': 9091, u'ipmi_username': u'admin', | | | u'deploy_kernel': u'8c21423c-eedf-4f9d-84c5-25e03f35fd76', | | | u'ipmi_address': u'10.1.67.60', u'deploy_ramdisk': u'93de142f-62a3-4a7e- | | | 8b94-2145c860523a', u'ipmi_password': u'******'} | | created_at | 2015-10-16T04:10:30+00:00 | | driver_internal_info | {u'clean_steps': None, u'agent_url': u'http://10.243.176.45:9999', | | | u'root_uuid_or_disk_id': u'0x00000000', u'is_whole_disk_image': True, | | | u'agent_last_heartbeat': 1445009962} | | chassis_uuid | | | instance_info | {u'root_gb': u'40', u'deploy_key': u'9BLPWR1PDTX3S5IYPNMP9FGZ9WFFIAJD', | | | u'image_source': u'4b6b5bbe-39c8-4398-b2e6-1854496ef28f', u'swap_mb': | | | u'0', u'capabilities': u'{"boot_option": "local"}'} | +------------------------+--------------------------------------------------------------------------+

View detailed information about a port:ironic --insecure port-show 0142fb06-a425-4b6d-a41e-481a5b54b8a2
The output should appear similar to the following:+-----------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------+ | Property | Value | +-----------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------+ | local_link_connection | {u'switch_info': u'ToR', u'port_id': u'Ten-GigabitEthernet1/0/12:2', | | | u'switch_id': u'aa:bb:cc:dd:ee:ff'} | | node_uuid | 5564213e-1e39-465b-be2e-5933c43650a0 | | uuid | 0142fb06-a425-4b6d-a41e-481a5b54b8a2 | | extra | {u'vif_port_id': u'ce2014de-cf35-44a4-9255-2975c99b7f1c'} | | pxe_enabled | True | | created_at | 2015-10-16T13:41:48+00:00 | | updated_at | 2015-10-16T15:40:03+00:00 | | address | f0:92:1c:05:5b:60 | | portgroup_uuid | | +-----------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------+ [R2N6640S1FTC]display current-configuration interface Ten-GigabitEthernet1/0/12: 2 # interface Ten-GigabitEthernet1/0/12:2 port link-mode bridge description CUST-5564213e-1e39-465b-be2e-5933c43650a0-host port access vlan 102 stp edged-port # return

View detailed information about a hypervisor:nova hypervisor-show 5564213e-1e39-465b-be2e-5933c43650a0
The output should appear similar to the following:+-------------------------+--------------------------------------+ | Property | Value | +-------------------------+--------------------------------------+ | cpu_info | | | current_workload | 0 | | disk_available_least | 0 | | free_disk_gb | 0 | | free_ram_mb | 0 | | host_ip | 192.168.102.8 | | hypervisor_hostname | 5564213e-1e39-465b-be2e-5933c43650a0 | | hypervisor_type | ironic | | hypervisor_version | 1 | | id | 4 | | local_gb | 40 | | local_gb_used | 40 | | memory_mb | 8192 | | memory_mb_used | 8192 | | running_vms | 1 | | service_disabled_reason | - | | service_host | BMCLOUD-RCP02-T1-M1-NETCLM | | service_id | 19 | | state | up | | status | enabled | | vcpus | 8 | | vcpus_used | 8 | +-------------------------+--------------------------------------+
